Why we exist

PROBLEM: Mass produced clothes don't fit everyone. Styles that are available aren't always suitable for our individual tastes or body shapes.

We founded AURZA out of a frustration of never being able to find the clothes we really wanted. There was always a compromise – too short, too baggy, too expensive or even too plain.

SOLUTION: Our sizes are based on real women using 3d scanning technology. We allow you to mix and match your top and bottom sizes for free or for an extra charge you can tailor your size to individual body measurements. You can customize your dresses to suit your unique style and taste by using our design builder to change the neckline, colour, hem length, sleeves or add detailing like leather a nd sequin trim.

AURZA passion for change (pictoral – maybe Gary can do?)

Real women 3d scan + choice of styling + choice of fit

OUR RANGE

Shift

Cut for maximum style the shift skims the top of your body whilst flaring out to the thighs. Added detailing at the hem and sides gives an extra charm to this modern classic.

Enhances: long legs, tall frames

Sheath

The impeccably tailored cut of the sheath dress flatters your curves by defining your waist and highlighting your calves to give you a perfect hourglass shape.

Enhances - all the curvy bits

Swoosh

Our classic sheath with perfectly positioned ruffles to draw the eyes to all the right places and flatter your middle area.

Enhances – waist, creates hourglass shape

Swing

Our classic bodice with a full swing skirt for a dramatic Audrey Hepburn effect gives you curves in all the right places.

Enhances – waist area (even if you don’t have one)

Fit and Flare

Our classic fitted bodice with a hip skimming skirt for maximum curves and comfort.

Enhances – gives you a slimmer silhouette

Shirt

Casual, sophisticated and incredibly versatile for all occasions and body shapes.

Enhances - bust

Maxi Shirt

Our maxi version of the shirt dress is equally as effortless and flattering, whilst lengthening the body to create an elegant silhouette.

Enhances – bust, upper body

How it works

  • 1. CHOOSE

  • 2. CUSTOMISE

  • 3. CHERISH

1. CHOOSE your favourite dress silhouette or ready to buy design

Change the neckline, sleeves, hem length and colour. Simply click on the “Customise” button to start adding personal touches.

2. Click CUSTOMISE to change anything you want or BUY to take it as it is.

Once you have paid through our secure payment gateway we will make your design exclusively for you and send it to you within 3 weeks

3. We hope that you will CHERISH your creation

But if it is not exactly how you dreamt it would be we will provide 300HKD for local tailoring, remake it free of charge or offer a full refund if returned unworn within 30 days of purchase*

I’VE NEVER CUSTOMISED BEFORE!

Don’t worry It’s very simple and if you aren’t happy with your garment you can return it within 30 days or get it altered.

About us

We founded AURZA out of a frustration of never being able to find the clothes we really wanted. After having children clothes shopping had lost its sparkle, left us deflated and there was always a compromise – too short, too baggy, too expensive or just too plain.

So our aim is simple - to allow women like us to create extraordinary clothes that reflect their own sense of style whilst both flattering and fitting each of our unique bodies.

We want everyone to be able to step out with confidence day and night, feeling a million dollars and we know from personal experience that a great outfit can make all the difference.

We are starting by offering utterly fabulous custom made dresses and separates designed by us and perfected by you. You choose the style and simply change the bodice, skirt, sleeves, length, fabric, trims and accessories.

You can then decide whether our unique standard sizing model based on 3d body scanning is right for you or whether you want us to create a bespoke pattern just for you based on your measurements.

Once you have experienced custom from the comfort of your own home you will always want to feel this good.
